```"""

	Given three raw arrays, construct a partially filled matrix, returns both
	axises and the resultent matrix. Can be fed into Plots.heatmap directly
"""
function mesh_hm(xs, ys, zs::Array{T}) where T<: Number
	x_axis = xs|>sort|>unique
	y_axis = ys|>sort|>unique
	res = Matrix{Union{Missing, eltype(zs)}}(undef, length(y_axis), length(x_axis))
	fill!(res, missing)
	for (idx,z) in enumerate(zs)
		x_idx = findfirst(isequal(xs[idx]), x_axis)
		y_idx = findfirst(isequal(ys[idx]), y_axis)
		res[y_idx, x_idx] = z
	end
	x_axis, y_axis, res
end```
